lines.text: People are always the same. Ignorant... Superstitious... Inferior! But they will accept the truth, even if I must... make their eyes shed tears of blood!
Oh, and one last favor. If you pass by heaven, give my regards to the angels. But if you end up in hell, give my adress to the devil.
Is life everything, and death nothing? Or is life nothing and death everything?
It's a lie! It's all lies!
